thread.title: More overnight closures on A14 at Girton as roadworks continue | Anglia
thread.title_full: More overnight closures on A14 at Girton as roadworks continue | Anglia - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: More overnight closures on A14 at Girton as roadworks continue | Anglia
text:
More overnight closures of the A14 at Girton will take place again tonight.
Both tonight and tomorrow night the eastbound carriageway of the A14 will be closed between junctions 31- 32 and there will be lane closures of the westbound carriageway.
Then between Monday 27th July and Friday 31st July the Eastbound carriageway will again be closed between junctions 31-32 and in addition there will be no westbound access to the A14 at either junction 32 or junction 36. All closures will all be effective between 8pm and 6am in the morning.
A 50mph speed restriction will remain in place along the road.
Last updated Sat 25 Jul 2015 Travel Cambridgeshire Girton
